name: Running out of Ice
description:
Epic MegaJam 2021 submission with a theme of "Running out of space" - Animals in the Arctic are running out of space as the climate change worsens. The polar bear cubs venture a little too far and need to be rescued after they get stranded due to melting ice. Their mother must find the cubs and take them home.

-- Asset List --

Bear visual assets are from FOREST ANIMALS PACK - PROTOFACTOR INC

Photo-realistic models & textures are from Quixel Megascans

Ice texture from Textures.com

Walk & jump & wind howl & rock rumble & icicle drop & bear roar & ui sounds are from weloveindies.com

Ice sliding sound effect is from Percy Duke - freesound.org

Breaking ice sound effect is from dheming - freesound.org

Success sound effect is from suburbanwizard - freesound.org

Piano menu music is from - Alexander Nakarada

Background terrain is made by Gokhan Karadayı - Photorealistic Landscape Pack 3 in Marketplace

Bear cub sound effect is from a recording of my beloved cat

Everything else has been done internally and within the duration of Epic MegaJam 2021

In case I forgot to mention a license, please contact me via comments
